p:
In this study, we performed a molecular investigation of CHIKV infection in symptomatic patients in Piaui State, Northeast Brazil, during 2016 and 2017. By using molecular tests, CHIKV infections were confirmed in 33 patients out of 112 tested samples. As the presence of acute symptoms such as fever, arthralgia, myalgia and headache lasting less than 5 days after the onset of the symptoms was a criterion of inclusion, our symptoms data should be carefully considered. However, it is noteworthy to add that one of the CHIKV-positive patients developed encephalitis, the most common neurological complication reported during outbreaks in La Reunion
34 , Guadeloupe and Martinique
35 islands.
